definition: member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker
Lin Chi-ling (1974-), Taiwanese model and actress

sentences.english: A Wang is looking for you.
sentences.chinese: 一位姓王的同介詞短語志正在找你。

sentences.english: But equally, Asako had been also traumatized.
sentences.chinese: 但是，志麻子也深受創傷。

sentences.english: As a day laborer, he had no health or disability insurance.
sentences.chinese: 身爲臨時工的王明志沒有醫療或工傷保險。

sentences.english: Local Dialect(1989)recorded thatYongchun dialect has 7 tones.
sentences.chinese: 據《永春方言志》記載，永春話有7個單字調。

sentences.english: The volunteers in primary schools of Taipei district present high satisfaction on job.
sentences.chinese: 臺北縣國民小學圖書館志工具有高度工作滿意度。

sentences.english: Although living under such poor situation, Confucius 'determined to study' since at the age of 15.
sentences.chinese: 雖然生活貧苦，孔子十五歲即“志於學”。

sentences.english: "Service" is the guidance principle and the basis to success of SMEE , we are striving all along.
sentences.chinese: 服務是志誠企業的宗旨和立身之本，我們一直在努力。

sentences.english: After the university graduates, emerald green flower achieves what one wishes marry Chen Zhi.
sentences.chinese: 大學畢業後，翠花如願以償的嫁給陳志。

sentences.english: He Zhou Annals provide us first-handed materials in the monographic study of He Zhou county.
sentences.chinese: 《河州志》是對河州進行專題研究的第一手基礎資料。

sentences.english: Like the books of Chronicles and Ezra, Nehemiah has a priestly emphasis.
sentences.chinese: 一如歷代志和以斯拉二書，尼希米也強調祭司職。

sentences.english: If a man wants to achieve what he wishes, Read the five sutras in front of the window.
sentences.chinese: 男兒欲遂平生志，五經勤向窗前讀。

sentences.english: The first chapter will be a basic analysis of editions and circulation of He Zhou Annals .
sentences.chinese: 第一章首先對《河州志》的版本及流傳進行了分析。

sentences.english: Chi road stretched from the foot of mountain top short.
sentences.chinese: 志高山峯矮，路從腳下伸。

sentences.english: My name is Chi Chan, I am a Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我的名字是陳志，我是一箇中國人。

sentences.english: "Zhuxi Academy Documents" were centered at the records related to the ancient academy.
sentences.chinese: 《竹溪志》的體例是以與書院有關的記錄爲中心的。

sentences.english: Orography is a kind of local gazetteer, it has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 山志是地方誌中專志的一種，編纂歷史源遠流長。

definition: worthy or virtuous person/honorific used for a person of the same or a younger generation
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
